text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump This didn’t help small businesses at all. All the money went to hedge funds and brokerages that just wanted free money. I voted for you in a swing state in 2016, and am now among many Republicans who cannot wait to vote you out in November. https://t.co/5aW7XY8VER
